title: Watch out for this toxic player
body:
Hey guys,

Just wanted to give people a heads up about this guy playing in High Gold/Low Plat ranked solo queue atm. 
A selection of his abuse in the post game lobby:

*name removed*
ur family gonna die in fire tonight
enjoy that
nxt time i see u in my game
ill d the same to u trash
ur mum gotAIDS
i love insulting trash like u
hopeless
got no life
cant even pla y a video game
ur mum sucks my **** for 20 bucks and u spent that money on games
cya trash
enjoy ur familts funireeal

So if you see this player in game, could you report him for his behaviour so he can hopefully get banned. It's encounters like these that may me not want to play the game, and I think it's pretty unfair for behaviour like this to go unpunished.

replies.body:
Will do, but it's kinda hard to report this person in particular if I don't know their name. 

All we can hope for is that everyone reports toxic players and they just ignore these people.

Regardless, I always report people who are toxic as I also see it unfair to see people like this unpunished in our community :(

I removed the name due to it violating one of the boards rules (the no name and shame rule). 

You are 100% right though, people need to report toxic players in the end of game screen in order for them to face punishment. Even if it isn't an immediate ban, all reports count and stack against a player if they continue on their negative path.

Im laughing hard at this solely because thats not how it works here.

Rito blow the offending player and arrange them escorts because behaving like this is perfectly acceptable and encourage.

you bring up that rule but never explain why. people are assholes in game and they don't have to worry about been publicly exposed yet when streamers or people in the public eye are exposed riot takes action whether it's against their policy and in their position to do so or not. and they hide behind the shield of "we own your account". chances are this person doesn't care about the minor consequences of his actions and you are just taking off the pressure of been toxic.
lol welcome to league oce where Riot doesn't care about anything else besides $$$$$$$$$$$$$$$
